)":[{"details":"Error processing","priorityFlag_EVVM":"True for async payment, false for sync payment","signature":"Signature proving authorization for this operation","signature_EVVM":"Signature for the EVVM payment transaction","user":"Address of the current username owner","username":"Username being sold"}},"acceptProposeAdmin()":{"details":"Can only be called by the proposed admin after the time delay has passed"},"addCustomMetadata(address,string,string,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,bool,bytes)":{"details":"Metadata follows format: [schema]:[subschema]>[value] Standard Format Examples: - memberOf:>EVVM - socialMedia:x>jistro (Twitter/X handle) - email:dev>jistro[at]evvm.org (development email) - email:callme>contact[at]jistro.xyz (contact email) Schema Guidelines: - Based on https://schema.org/docs/schemas.html - ':' separates schema from subschema - '>' separates metadata from value - Pad with spaces if schema/subschema < 5 characters - Use \"socialMedia\" for social networks with network name as subschema","params":{"identity":"Username to add metadata to","nonce":"Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks","nonce_EVVM":"Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction","priorityFee_EVVM":"Priority fee for faster transaction processing","priorityFlag_EVVM":"True for async payment, false for sync payment","signature":"Signature proving authorization for this operation","signature_EVVM":"Signature for the EVVM payment transaction","user":"Address of the username owner","value":"Metadata string following the standardized format"}},"cancelChangeEvvmAddress()":{"details":"Only the current admin can cancel pending proposals"},"cancelProposeAdmin()":{"details":"Only the current admin can cancel pending attacks by tracking used nonces per user","params":{"_nonce":"Nonce value to verify","_user":"Address of the user to check"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the nonce has been used, false if still available"}},"claimWithdrawPrincipalTokens()":{"details":"Can only be called after the time delay has passed"},"constructor":{"details":"Sets up the EVVM integration and initial transaction","user":"Address of the username owner","username":"Username to completely remove from the system"}},"getAdmin()":{"details":"Returns the address with administrative privileges","returns":{"_0":"The current admin address"}},"getAdminFullDetails()":{"details":"Returns current admin, proposed admin, and proposal acceptance active and expired offers that haven't been withdrawn","params":{"_username":"The username to get offers for"},"returns":{"offers":"Array of all offer metadata owner"}},"getPriceOfRegistration(string)":{"details":"Price is fully dynamic based on existing offers and timing      - If dosnt have offers, price is 100x current EVVM reward amount      - If has offers, price is calculated via seePriceToRenew function","params":{"username":"The username to get registration price for"},"returns":{"_0":"The current registration price in Principal Tokens"}},"getPriceToAddCustomMetadata()":{"details":"Price is dynamic based on current EVVM reward amount","returns":{"price":"Cost in Principal Tokens (10x current reward amount)"}},"getPriceToFlushCustomMetadata(string)":{"details":"Cost scales with the number of metadata entries to remove","params":{"_identity":"The username to calculate flush cost amount)"}},"getProposedWithdrawAmountFullDetails()":{"details":"Returns proposed withdrawal amount and acceptance deadline","returns":{"proposalAmountToWithdrawTokens":"Proposed withdrawal amount in contract"}},"proposeWithdrawPrincipalTokens(uint256)":{"details":"Amount must be available after reserving funds for operations and locked offers","params":{"_amount":"Amount of Principal Tokens to transaction","priorityFee_EVVM":"Priority fee for faster transaction processing","priorityFlag_EVVM":"True for async payment, false for sync payment","signature":"Signature proving authorization for hash)"}},"removeCustomMetadata(address,string,uint256,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,bool,bytes)":{"details":"Shifts all subsequent metadata entries to fill the gap after owner"}},"renewUsername(address,string,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,bool,bytes)":{"details":"Pricing varies based on timing and market demand for the username Pricing Rules: - Free renewal if done within 1 year of expiration (limited time offer) - Variable cost based on highest active offer (minimum 500 Principal Token) - Fixed 500,000 Principal Token if renewed more than 1 year before expiration - Can be renewed up to 100 years in advance","params":{"nonce":"Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks","nonce_EVVM":"Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction","priorityFee_EVVM":"Priority fee for faster transaction processing","priorityFlag_EVVM":"True for async payment, false for sync payment","signature":"Signature proving authorization for this operation","signature_EVVM":"Signature for the EVVM payment transaction","user":"Address of the username owner","username":"Username to renew"}},"seePriceToRenew(string)":{"details":"Pricing varies based on timing and market demand:      - Free if renewed before expiration (within grace period)      - Variable cost based on highest active offer (minimum 500 Principal Token)      - Fixed 500,000 Principal Token if renewed more than 1 year before expiration","params":{"_identity":"The username to calculate renewal price for"},"returns":{"price":"The cost in Principal Tokens to renew the username"}},"strictVerifyIfIdentityExist(string)":{"details":"More strict version that reverts instead of returning false","params":{"_username":"The username to verify"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the username exists (will revert if not)"}},"verifyIfIdentityExists(string)":{"details":"Handles both pre-registrations and actual username registrations","params":{"_identity":"The identity/username to check"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the identity exists and is valid"}},"verifyStrictAndGetOwnerOfIdentity(string)":{"details":"Combines strict verification with owner lookup in one exist)"}},"withdrawOffer(address,string,uint256,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,bool,bytes)":{"details":"Can only be called by the offer creator before expiration","params":{"nonce":"Unique nonce to processing","priorityFlag_EVVM":"True for async payment, false for sync payment","signature":"Signature proving authorization for this operation","signature_EVVM":"Signature for the EVVM payment transaction","user":"Address that made the original offer","username":"Username the offer was made for"}}},"stateVariables":{"PRINCIPAL_TOKEN_ADDRESS":{"details":"Constant address representing the acceptChangeEvvmAddress().details: Can only be called after the time delay has passed

acceptOffer(address,string,uint256,uint2.details: Can only be called by the current username owner before offer expiration

params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.offerID: Unique identifier of the offer to accept
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction
params.user: Address of the current username owner

acceptProposeAdmin().details: Can only be called by the proposed admin after the time delay has passed

addCustomMetadata(address,string,string,.details: Metadata follows format: [schema]:[subschema]>[value] Standard Format Examples: - memberOf:>EVVM - socialMedia:x>jistro (Twitter/X handle) - email:dev>jistro[at]evvm.org (development email) - email:callme>contact[at]jistro.xyz (contact email) Schema Guidelines: - Based on https://schema.org/docs/schemas.html - ':' separates schema from subschema - '>' separates metadata from value - Pad with spaces if schema/subschema < 5 characters - Use "socialMedia" for social networks with network name as subschema

params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction
params.value: Metadata string following the standardized format

cancelChangeEvvmAddress().details: Only the current admin can cancel pending proposals

cancelProposeAdmin().details: Only the current admin can cancel pending proposals

cancelWithdrawPrincipalTokens().details: Only the current admin can cancel pending proposals

checkIfNameServiceNonceIsAvailable(addre.details: Prevents replay attacks by tracking used nonces per user

params._user: Address of the user to check

returns._0: True if the nonce has been used, false if still available

claimWithdrawPrincipalTokens().details: Can only be called after the time delay has passed

constructor.details: Sets up the EVVM integration and initial admin

params._evvmAddress: Address of the EVVM core contract for payment processing
params._initialOwner: Address that will have admin privileges

flushCustomMetadata(address,string,uint2.details: More gas-efficient than removing entries individually

params.identity: Username to flush all metadata from
params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction

flushUsername(address,string,uint256,byt.details: Deletes the username, all custom metadata, and makes it available for re-registration

params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction
params.username: Username to completely remove from the system

getAdmin().details: Returns the address with administrative privileges

getAdminFullDetails().details: Returns current admin, proposed admin, and proposal acceptance deadline

returns.timeToAcceptAdmin: Timestamp when proposal can be accepted

getAmountOfCustomMetadata(string).details: Returns the count of metadata slots currently used

params._username: The username to count metadata for

getCustomMetadataMaxSlotsOfIdentity(stri.details: Returns the total capacity for custom metadata entries

params._username: The username to check metadata capacity for

getEvvmAddress().details: Returns the address of the EVVM contract used for payment processing

getEvvmAddressFullDetails().details: Returns current EVVM address, proposed address, and proposal acceptance deadline

returns.timeToAcceptEvvmAddress: Timestamp when proposal can be accepted

getExpireDateOfIdentity(string).details: Returns the timestamp when the username registration expires

params._identity: The username to check expiration for

returns._0: The expiration timestamp in seconds since Unix epoch

getFullCustomMetadataOfIdentity(string).details: Returns an array containing all metadata strings in order

params._username: The username to get metadata for

returns._0: Array of all custom metadata strings

getIdentityBasicMetadata(string).details: Returns essential metadata for quick identity verification

params._username: The username to get basic info for

getLengthOfOffersUsername(string).details: Iterates through offers to find the actual count of non-empty slots

params._username: The username to count offers for

returns.length: Total number of offers that have been made

getOffersOfUsername(string).details: Returns both active and expired offers that haven't been withdrawn

params._username: The username to get offers for

returns.offers: Array of all offer metadata structures

getOwnerOfIdentity(string).details: Returns the current owner address for any valid identity

getPriceOfRegistration(string).details: Price is fully dynamic based on existing offers and timing      - If dosnt have offers, price is 100x current EVVM reward amount      - If has offers, price is calculated via seePriceToRenew function

params.username: The username to get registration price for

returns._0: The current registration price in Principal Tokens

getPriceToAddCustomMetadata().details: Price is dynamic based on current EVVM reward amount

returns.price: Cost in Principal Tokens (10x current reward amount)

getPriceToFlushCustomMetadata(string).details: Cost scales with the number of metadata entries to remove

params._identity: The username to calculate flush cost for

returns.price: Total cost in Principal Tokens (10x reward amount per metadata entry)

getPriceToFlushUsername(string).details: Includes cost for metadata removal plus base username deletion fee

params._identity: The username to calculate deletion cost for

returns.price: Total cost in Principal Tokens (metadata flush cost + 1x reward amount)

getPriceToRemoveCustomMetadata().details: Price is dynamic based on current EVVM reward amount

returns.price: Cost in Principal Tokens (10x current reward amount)

getProposedWithdrawAmountFullDetails().details: Returns proposed withdrawal amount and acceptance deadline

returns.proposalAmountToWithdrawTokens: Proposed withdrawal amount in Principal Tokens
returns.timeToAcceptAmountToWithdrawTokens: Timestamp when proposal can be executed

getSingleCustomMetadataOfIdentity(string.details: Retrieves metadata at a specific slot position

params._key: The index of the metadata entry to retrieve
params._username: The username to get metadata from

returns._0: The metadata string at the specified index

getSingleOfferOfUsername(string,uint256).details: Retrieves detailed information about a particular offer

params._offerID: The ID/index of the specific offer
params._username: The username to get the offer from

hashUsername(string,uint256).details: Used in the commit-reveal scheme to prevent front-running attacks

returns._0: Hash of the username and random number

isUsernameAvailable(string).details: A username is available if it was never registered or has been expired for 60+ days

params._username: The username to check availability for

returns._0: True if the username is available for registration

makeOffer(address,string,uint256,uint256.details: Locks the offer amount in the contract until withdrawn or accepted

params.amount: Amount being offered in Principal Tokens
params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction

returns.offerID: Unique identifier for the created offer

preRegistrationUsername(address,bytes32,.details: Creates a temporary reservation that can be registered 30 minutes later

params.hashPreRegisteredUsername: Keccak256 hash of username + random number
params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction
params.user: Address of the user making the pre-registration

proposeAdmin(address).details: Part of the time-delayed governance system for admin changes

params._adminToPropose: Address of the proposed new admin

proposeChangeEvvmAddress(address).details: Critical function that affects payment processing integration

params._newEvvmAddress: Address of the new EVVM contract

proposeWithdrawPrincipalTokens(uint256).details: Amount must be available after reserving funds for operations and locked offers

params._amount: Amount of Principal Tokens to withdraw

registrationUsername(address,string,uint.details: Must be called after the pre-registration period (30 minutes) has reached

params.clowNumber: Random number used in the pre-registration hash
params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction
params.user: Address of the user completing the registration
params.username: The actual username being registered (revealed from hash)

removeCustomMetadata(address,string,uint.details: Shifts all subsequent metadata entries to fill the gap after removal

params.key: Index of the metadata entry to remove
params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction

renewUsername(address,string,uint256,byt.details: Pricing varies based on timing and market demand for the username Pricing Rules: - Free renewal if done within 1 year of expiration (limited time offer) - Variable cost based on highest active offer (minimum 500 Principal Token) - Fixed 500,000 Principal Token if renewed more than 1 year before expiration - Can be renewed up to 100 years in advance

params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction

seePriceToRenew(string).details: Pricing varies based on timing and market demand:      - Free if renewed before expiration (within grace period)      - Variable cost based on highest active offer (minimum 500 Principal Token)      - Fixed 500,000 Principal Token if renewed more than 1 year before expiration

params._identity: The username to calculate renewal price for

returns.price: The cost in Principal Tokens to renew the username

strictVerifyIfIdentityExist(string).details: More strict version that reverts instead of returning false

returns._0: True if the username exists (will revert if not)

verifyIfIdentityExists(string).details: Handles both pre-registrations and actual username registrations

returns._0: True if the identity exists and is valid

verifyStrictAndGetOwnerOfIdentity(string.details: Combines strict verification with owner lookup in one call

params._username: The username to verify and get owner for

returns.answer: Address of the username owner (reverts if username doesn't exist)

withdrawOffer(address,string,uint256,uin.details: Can only be called by the offer creator before expiration

params.nonce: Unique nonce to prevent replay attacks
params.nonce_EVVM: Nonce for the EVVM payment transaction
params.offerID: Unique identifier of the offer to withdraw
params.priorityFee_EVVM: Priority fee for faster transaction processing
params.priorityFlag_EVVM: True for async payment, false for sync payment
params.signature: Signature proving authorization for this operation
params.signature_EVVM: Signature for the EVVM payment transaction
params.user: Address that made the original offer
params.username: Username the offer was made for

acceptOffer(address,string,uint256,uint2.notice: Accepts a marketplace offer and transfers username ownership

acceptProposeAdmin().notice: Accepts the admin proposal and becomes the new admin

cancelWithdrawPrincipalTokens().notice: Cancels the pending token withdrawal proposal

flushUsername(address,string,uint256,byt.notice: Completely removes a username registration and all associated data

getIdentityBasicMetadata(string).notice: Gets basic identity information (owner and expiration date)

getLengthOfOffersUsername(string).notice: Counts the total number of offers made for a username

getOffersOfUsername(string).notice: Gets all offers made for a specific username

getOwnerOfIdentity(string).notice: Gets the owner address of a registered identity

getPriceOfRegistration(string).notice: Gets price to register an username

getPriceToAddCustomMetadata().notice: Gets the current price to add custom metadata to a username

getPriceToFlushCustomMetadata(string).notice: Gets the cost to remove all custom metadata entries from a username

getPriceToFlushUsername(string).notice: Gets the cost to completely remove a username and all its data

getPriceToRemoveCustomMetadata().notice: Gets the current price to remove a single custom metadata entry

getProposedWithdrawAmountFullDetails().notice: Gets information about pending token withdrawal proposals

getSingleCustomMetadataOfIdentity(string.notice: Gets a specific custom metadata entry by index

getSingleOfferOfUsername(string,uint256).notice: Gets a specific offer for a username by offer ID

hashUsername(string,uint256).notice: Creates a hash of username and random number for pre-registration

isUsernameAvailable(string).notice: Checks if a username is available for registration

makeOffer(address,string,uint256,uint256.notice: Creates a marketplace offer to purchase a username

preRegistrationUsername(address,bytes32,.notice: Pre-registers a username hash to prevent front-running attacks

proposeAdmin(address).notice: Proposes a new admin address with 1-day time delay

proposeChangeEvvmAddress(address).notice: Proposes to change the EVVM contract address

proposeWithdrawPrincipalTokens(uint256).notice: Proposes to withdraw Principal Tokens from the contract

registrationUsername(address,string,uint.notice: Completes username registration using a pre-registration commitment

renewUsername(address,string,uint256,byt.notice: Renews a username registration for another year

seePriceToRenew(string).notice: Calculates the cost to renew a username registration

strictVerifyIfIdentityExist(string).notice: Strictly verifies if an identity exists and reverts if not found
